artist: Artist: Mac McGill , et al.; Author: Mumia Abu-Jamal , et al.; Editor: Sabrina Jones; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of three figures springing from a character's head, with expressionist coloring with chalk or crayon outside of the lines of the figures, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 96 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #23
